AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sangheili Military Orphan
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was like all of [PAWN_possessive] brothers and sisters, forced into the military as a child and abandoned by [PAWN_possessive] parents.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sangheili Slave
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was never placed in the military and were instead forced into slavery from a young age. [PAWN_pronoun] was told they would never ascend into honorable roles than being beaten down by [PAWN_possessive] masters and forced into labor.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Swordsman Trainee
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a trainee, training in swordsmanship for [PAWN_possessive] state. [PAWN_pronoun] is taught and beaten from a young age to rise in skill and eventually earn one of the highest honors than can befall a sangheili.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sangheili Farmer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] lived on Sangheilios or in the outer colonies producing crop for [PAWN_possessive] state. [PAWN_pronoun] is taught to have no aspirations beyond growing food for [PAWN_possessive] brethren, but some manage to make it out through careful planning.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sangheili Minor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is at the lowest rank amongst [PAWN_possessive] kind. Minors are the most common class of Sangheili and are also the least experienced out of all of their superiors.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sangheili Major
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Just above Minor, Majors are skilled sangheili that often lead groups of Unggoy or Minors into battle. [PAWN_nameDef] is one such Major who has proven [PAWN_possessive] worth in battle.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sangheili Ultra
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Ultras are found mostly leading ground campaigns and are skilled commanders of small engagements. They are meant to accomplish smaller goals on the battlefield. [PAWN_nameDef] knows how to lead a group of [PAWN_possessive] troops.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sangheili General
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: The highest ranking of all ground field units, [PAWN_nameDef] is a General leading hundreds to thousands of [PAWN_possessive] brothers and sisters into enemy territory.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sangheili Ranger
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Volunteers who are skilled at operating in airless environments. [PAWN_nameDef] seeks to bring honor to themselves and [PAWN_possessive] state through fierce mobile firepower.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sangheili Spec Ops
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Spec Ops are sent out to accomplish only the hardest of objectives, they are some of the fiercest warriors of the sangheili army. [PAWN_nameDef] has a purpose to achieve and will do anything to get it done.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sangheili Medic
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Allowed into the army after The Great Schism, Sangheili medics seek to repair those who have been injured on the battlefield. While shameful in the past, [PAWN_nameDef] seeks to demonstrate that [PAWN_possessive] honor is held in the battle with death itself.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sangheili Spec-Ops Medic
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Like most Spec-Ops personel, [PAWN_nameDef] is sent on very difficult missions with [PAWN_possessive] brethren to hopefully keep them alive long enough to accomplish [PAWN_possessive] goal.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sangheili Honorguard
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: The Sangheili Honor Guardsmen are personal guards to council members in the Sangheili political environment. [PAWN_nameDef] is here to defend [PAWN_possessive] leaders at all costs.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sangheili Zealot
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Zealots have a wide variety of roles in the Sangheili navy. They command ships or whole armies on the ground.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sangheili Supreme Commander
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Commander of a large fleet of [PAWN_possessive] own. [PAWN_nameDef] has many ships that [PAWN_pronoun] control as well as the knowledge and skill to lead [PAWN_possessive] troops.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sangheili Imperial Admiral
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is the leader of the Sangheili navy in its entirety and has complete control over all of its forces. [PAWN_pronoun] command everything that goes in and out of the navy and only one of them is known to exist at a time.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sangheili Arbiter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: In times of crisis, a sangheili is given the rank of Arbiter to take control of the military and use their high skill to put an end to whatever problem has arisen. It is one of the most ancient ranks in the sangheili military and [PAWN_nameDef] has now donned the mantle.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sangheili Kaidon
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is the leader of [PAWN_possessive] state on sangheilios, elected by the state council to act as their political ruler.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sangheili Swordsman
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Highly trained warrior who has been taught how to wield an energy sword.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sangheili High Councilor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a member of the High Council and a very important political leader of the Sangheili government. [PAWN_pronoun] normally have to serve at least some military time before [PAWN_pronoun] can get this position.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sangheili Slave
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] somehow survived most of [PAWN_possessive] lives under the boots of [PAWN_possessive] masters through sheer determination. Hopefully [PAWN_possessive] strength and fierocity will lead to [PAWN_possessive] freedom or [PAWN_pronoun] may never make it out.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sangheili Prisoner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Whether from misfortune or dishonorable actions, [PAWN_nameDef] has been taken as a prisoner by the Sangheili and will either face execution or forced labor until [PAWN_pronoun] die or are rescued.
